p: 50 g of the fine powder was extracted using 500 mL of methanol, then the procedure was repeated between each extraction to remove the solvent using Rotavapor R-200/205 ( Dunn, Turnbull & Sharon, 2004). Each extract was filtered using Whatman filter paper No. 4. The extract was evaporated in vacuum using Buchi Rotary Evaporator (Rotavapor R-200/205) coupled with EYELA Cool Ace (CA-1110) and Buchi vacuum system B-169. The residue was kept in a fridge at 4 °C prior to further analytical use.
